committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To designate the Bowen Gulch area of the Arapaho National Forest in the State of Colorado as part of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Bowen Gulch Wilderness Act of 1991 - Designates the Bowen Gulch Additions to the Never Summer Wilderness in Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System. Sets forth provisions with respect to allocation of water rights between the United States and Colorado relating to such wilderness lands. Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from selling any trees, portions thereof, or forest products within a specified area of the Arapaho National Forest, Colorado, except under certain circumstances.

titles.title: To designate the Bowen Gulch area of the Arapaho National Forest in the State of Colorado as part of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and for other purposes.
